attributes.additional_details: My son needs this drug, Orkambi will give my son many more years of life FACT! What is the government doing, how can any person put a price on a child’s life, all children deserve this, our children fight everyday to stay alive, when you look at my boy you see a smiley happy little boy but inside is a different story, he fights every single day to stay alive,this drug could give him many more years of life PLEASE PLEASE sign this and share thank you I want my boy forever ❤️
attributes.background: My son needs this drug, Orkambi will give my son many more years of life FACT! What is the government doing!!!!
